com.elseforif.log

类 MetaLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.elseforif.log.MetaLog

  • public abstract class MetaLog
extends java.lang.Object
    A MetaLog is a central object which can perform basic logging to the standard output. This can be preferable to the more direct 'System.out.println()' calls, since such calls cannot conveniently be disabled globally or filtered.

    This class also maintains a global debug flag, which can be used freely.

    I also use this as a base class for a central definitive object for each Web site I create. This object facilitates the sharing of constant values between servlets and applets while providing a lightweight logging interface for the applets.

    • 方法详细资料

      • Log

        public static void Log(java.lang.String message)
        Log a string message to the console.
        参数:
        message - a string to be logged

      • Log

        public static void Log(java.lang.String message,
                       java.lang.Exception exception)
        Log a message an exception stack track to the console. The message is 'message', if that is supplied, or 'exception.getMessage()' otherwise.
        参数:
        message - an optional message describing the exception
        exception - the exception to be logged

      • Debug

        public static void Debug(java.lang.String message)
        Log a "debug" message, iff the debug mode is set to true.
        参数:
        message - a message to be logged if debug logging is enabled

      • GetDebugMode

        public static boolean GetDebugMode()
        Return whether the global debug mode is enabled
        返回:
        whether the debug mode is enabled

      • SetDebugMode

        public static void SetDebugMode(boolean debugMode)
        Set the global debug mode to 'debugMode'. Messages logged using 'Debug()' will only be outputted if this is true.
        参数:
        debugMode - whether to enable the global debug mode
